content: this pattern is also free on my blog www chrisettedesigns com clawd the crab is the pet of jellina and the entire pattern including clawd jelling and her coral home is available as well he can be made as a pin by simply gluing one on with fabric glue or closing up the bottom as a mini plush toy both versions are in the pattern the pattern is in english u s terms only it is a written pattern with lots of photos stitches used single_crochet single_crochet slip_stitch slip_stitch chain chain measurements approximately about 2 375 inches 6 0325 cm wide 2 25 inches 5 715 cm long this pattern is not to be used for resale you can sell what you make but must use your own photos and should credit me by showing the link to my pattern here if you need assistance or find a site selling my pattern please feel free to contact me here enjoy -lizette p s i would be super thrilled if you shared photos of your creations from this pattern with me instagram @chrisette_designs facebook chrisette designs tiktok @chrisette_designs happy hooking
